version_description:
Just added:
-New type of special stages, "Competitive Stage"

IMPROVEMENTS
-The software glitch that occurred around entering Japanese nickname
with Non-genuine keyboard apps.

New features to come that will ease gameplay for beginners!

- The application recommends Pokémon to capture. Let them join your team!
- Tough stages show a recommended level that your Pokémon should be at before tackling the challenge.
- The
- The user interface has been adjusted to improve the display, and other modifications have been made to the game for a better play experience.

◇ New features:
-Your Profile in My Info reflects your progress in the game
-You'll see the difficulty level on the stage selection screen of some stages

◇ Various adjustments, including to the user interface, to improve the play experience

◇ We’ve added value sets of 4 and 8 Jewels that can only be purchased one time each.
For details on the features being added, see your in-game notifications.

◇ We’ve made some adjustments to the UI (display and usability) to improve your play ex

◇ We have added a feature so that when you return to a stage, you can bring the same Pokémon you brought with you the previous time you attempted that stage.

For details, please refer to the in-game notices.

◇ We have made some adjustments

◇ We have added the following gameplay elements.
　• Trainer Rank! Catch Pokémon to rank up!
　• Log-in bonus has been revamped!

◇ We have made some adjustments to the UI to improve the play experience.

◇ Various issues have been res

◇ We have added the following gameplay elements.
　• Trainer Rank! Catch Pokémon to rank up!
　• Log-in bonus has been revamped!

◇ We have made some adjustments to the UI to improve the play experience.

◇ Various issues have been res

- The user interface has been adjusted to improve the display, and other modifications have been made to the game for a better play experience.
- Problem resolved
